Batman vs. the Red Hood is a punch in the stomach. The story is based on the comic book miniseries of the same name, 2005, and shows how the second Robin, Jason Todd, was cruelly murdered by the Joker and reemerged as the new version of an old classic villain, the Red Hood. In addition to the explicit violence and the large amount of deaths, the animation is endowed with intense dramatic charge. Distorted by the reborn Jason, do not just fight crime, you need to control it at any cost.
